fields.name: ErrorMessage
fields.fieldText: An error occured: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: FormHeading
fields.fieldText: Mental Health Service Referral Form

fields.name: FormInstructions
fields.fieldText:
This is NOT AN EMERGENCY CRISIS SERVICE. If crisis support is required, please call 000 or your local emergency service.


Please note, services are restricted to children, teens or adults living with a Heart Condition and their families/carers.


PLEASE NOTE: * denotes mandatory information. If this information is not included, referral may be delayed or not accepted.

fields.name: Consent_to_receive_service_be_contacted_for_service_and_for_sharing_of_servic
fields.fieldText: Consent to receive service, be contacted for service and for sharing of service delivery information (Please tick where applicable)

fields.name: Please_specify_the_reason_the_client_did_not_provide_consent
fields.fieldText: Please specify the reason the client did not provide consent

rightValue.stringValue: No, Client has not provided consent for any of the above

fields.name: SuccessMessage
fields.fieldText: Mental Health Service Referral Form has been sent successfully.

fields.name: SuccessMessage2
fields.fieldText: Referral status has been updated successfully.

textTemplates.name: EmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Hi there,

A new contact has been referred to you. You can view the contact record in Salesforce using the link below:

{!$Label.Org_Base_Url}/lightning/r/Contact/{!recordId}/view

Thank you
